pkgmetadata.longdescription: This plugin checks for specific keywords in image/gif, image/jpeg or image/png attachments, using gocr (an optical character recognition program). This plugin can be used to detect spam that puts all the real spam content in an attached image. The mail itself only random text and random html, without any URL's or identifiable information.

use.flag: Enable support for the gocr OCR engine
Enable support for the ocrad OCR engine
Enable support for the tesseract OCR engine
